content: Actually, CNBC is a sister network to ABC, which is the network that airs Shark Tank. However, CNBC does air repeats of Shark Tank episodes on its network as a part of their programming lineup. Shark Tank is a popular reality show where aspiring entrepreneurs pitch their business ideas to a panel of high-profile investors, known as "sharks," in the hopes of securing funding and mentorship. The show has been on air since 2009 and has become a cultural phenomenon, inspiring a wave of new entrepreneurs and investors.
